title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

Meme frenzy overwhelmed one poor developer when he accidentally burned over $10 million worth of Solana, but he wasn’t out of pocket for long. The Qatari sovereign wealth fund likely won't invest in Bitcoin (BTC) anytime soon, a local finance executive has told Cointelegraph. Uncertainty in the market has had a knock-on effect on Bitcoin exchange-traded funds, which have seen net inflows drop by 80%.

One memecoin that has grabbed the crypto community’s attention is Slerf. The creator behind the project mistakenly burnt over $10 million in Solana before the launch, however, despite that the memecoin was launched and reached $500 million market cap within hours.

The developer raised 535,000 Solana (SOL) tokens to launch the memecoin but accidentally burnt $10.4 million worth of Solana tokens while trying to clear their wallet.

Read more

title: Monitok Unveils Points program to promote self-custody between crypto users.
description: Vilnius, Lithuania, March  18, 2024 — Monitok, a next-gen self-custodial exchange that combines features of both decentralized and centralized trading platforms, recently announced its Monitok rewards program. To celebrate their new project’s launch, the team is giving away 10,000,000 points. This announcement further hints at a future token airdrop from the pool of 100,000 USD […]

title: Slow XRP Price Movement Leads Investors to Algotech Soaring Presale
description: Amidst the tumultuous journey of XRP's price fluctuations, investors find themselves at a crossroads, seeking stability and potential opportunities beyond traditional cryptocurrencies. With XRP's price oscillating within a narrow range and concerns looming over its future trajectory, investors are turning their gaze toward alternative avenues.

title: Bitcoin Technical Analysis: BTC Navigates Volatile Waves of Change
description: As bitcoin flirts with the boundaries of its recent trading range, its price oscillation reflects a vibrant yet undecided market, standing at a pivotal $68,259 per unit, after testing waters between $64,522 and $68,902 within a 24-hour frame. title: EA Shuts Down Battlefield Studio Amid Layoffs
description: In a significant move within the gaming industry, Electronic Arts (EA) has announced the closure of Ridgeline Games, a studio heavily involved in developing the Battlefield franchise. The decision comes alongside EA’s broader restructuring effort, including layoffs affecting approximately 5% of its workforce. Ridgeline Games, founded in 2021 and led by industry veteran Marcus Lehto, […]

title: From donations to decisions: how crypto PACs target Senate races
description: Crypto-focused PACs, backed by the industry’s giants, are making waves in Senate campaigns to elect crypto-friendly leaders. Crypto-focused political action committees (PACs) like Fairshake are rising, with significant financial contributions to Senate races. Backed by prominent figures in the cryptocurrency…
